heading: Today
text: Mostly sunny, with a few clouds passing in the south. Highs in the low to mid 60s. Light southerly wind.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly clear in the evening, then clouds increasing from the south to the north after midnight. Chance of isolated showers mainly south of Route 4. Lows in the 30s to low 40s. Light and variable wind.

heading: Sunday
text: Partly cloudy in the north in the morning, then increasing clouds from the south throughout the day. Slight chance of scattered showers mainly south of Route 2. Highs in the low to mid 60s. Wind becoming east to southeast at 10 to 15 mph, gusting 20 to 25 mph in the south and over higher elevation.
